Key Arguments: The government should not be the arbiter of truth or censor dissenting opinions.
Open and honest debate is the solution to misinformation, not censorship.
The bill threatens freedom of speech and could weaken democracy.
The legislation represents government overreach and could lead to authoritarianism.
Notable Quotes: The solution is open and honest debate.
This bill represents complete government overreach.
When loyalty to the government and its version of truth is the supreme virtue, we cross the threshold into totalitarianism.
